bugs: [Bug] - Fixed the issue where you could not log out. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/241)
[Enhancement] - Added the ability to 'Reinitialize' cards, so that they can be more dynamic with content [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/233)
[Bug] - Fixed an issue where cards were initializing twice. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/233)
[Bug] - Fixed an issue where failed cron jobs weren't resetting their active status. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/242)
